title: Enhancing Instructional Competencies: Developing Patient Education Materials for Professional Learners: Visual Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic concepts and specialized terminology in medical/legal/technical fields
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design visual explanations (diagrams, infographics, etc.) aligned with the purpose of patient education materials.
Learners acquire the ability to deconstruct medical information step-by-step and convert it into easy-to-understand visual formats.
Learners can adjust the complexity of visual explanations according to the comprehension level of target patients (age/occupational groups).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
